hero.title: Wear your cause on the web
hero.text: Choose from curated, mission-driven campaigns. Wear and share your cause and earn money for your cause! It’s a win-win.

facets.title: Choose a cause
facets.text: We’ll curate timely campaigns from partners like Code.org, Internet Archives, Women Who Code, Wikipedia, and Electric Frontier Foundation. Choose one to support for the month. Stick around to stay in the know about exciting mission-driven work happening now.

facets.title: Wear it, loud and proud
facets.text: Get an fun initiative badge to attach to your online profiles! Others can hover and click on it to learn about your initiative.

facets.title: Get honorary memberships
facets.text: Get an honorary membership when you’re a top contributor to a campaign! That could mean a special invite or subscription or swag.

facets.title: Nominate Partner Organizations
facets.text: Spearhead a mission-aligned organization that might benefit from Good Browser. Or apply to partner with Good Browser and join its network of companies, big and small, doing good on the Web.
